name: Super Stealth AdvenTure
description:
Airi likes exploring, but suddenly an army of enemies spawned behind her. Help Airi get back home!

Drakan and Thief meet, the worst of both worlds! (Please don't waste your time looking for a dragon to ride)

Controls:

Keyboard/Mouse: Mouse buttons for attacks, left CTRL for stealth, SPACE for jump

Gamepad: Triggers for attacks, right face button or left bumper for stealth, lower face button for jump

Attempted PS1-ish graphics, except everything has too many polygons.

There are three different endings to discover, one of which might be pretty hard without exploits.

I learned a ton while making this, and despite it being for the jam it's for, I hope it's still somewhat fun to play!

Music: Ditto by Waidmann on Newgrounds
